apiKey.comment: If you are using a local dojo, you must specify the apiKey for communicating with it.
attributionColor.comment: The text color for the source attribution line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
confirmedColor.comment: The color of the text label for confirmed inputs expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
elapsedColor.comment: The color of the text label for elapsed time expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
headerColor.comment: The color to use for the image header text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
poolHeaderColor.comment: The color to use for the individual pool header expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
registeredColor.comment: The color of the text label for registered inputs expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor socks proxy for privacy.
whirlpoolUrl.comment: The url to use for retrieving pool information from whirlpool instance.  If you have a local dojo with whirlpool-cli, you may use that server here in protocol://ip-or-fqdn:port format
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
